# Semicolon Separator Test

Tests semicolon-separated citation format.

## Multiple Citations

Research shows [1, 2, 3] that this format is supported.
Additional studies [4, 5, 6] confirm the findings.

## Mixed Format

Combining formats [1, 2, 3] and standard [4] citations works correctly.

[1]: https://example.com/ref1
[2]: https://example.com/ref2
[3]: https://example.com/ref3
[4]: https://example.com/ref4
[5]: https://example.com/ref5
[6]: https://example.com/ref6
